topics.name: Basic Arithmetic
topics.description: The branch of mathematics dealing with basic number operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

topics.name: Pre-Algebra
topics.description: An introductory course to algebra, focusing on fundamental concepts like variables, expressions, and simple equations.

topics.name: Algebra
topics.description: The study of mathematical symbols and the rules for manipulating these symbols; a unifying thread of almost all of mathematics.

topics.name: Geometry
topics.description: The branch of mathematics concerned with the properties and relations of points, lines, surfaces, solids, and higher-dimensional analogs.

topics.name: Trigonometry
topics.description: The study of relationships between the angles and sides of triangles and the calculations based on them.

topics.name: Pre-Calculus
topics.description: A course that prepares students for calculus, covering topics such as functions, complex numbers, and trigonometry.

topics.name: Calculus
topics.description: The mathematical study of continuous change, dealing with derivatives and integrals of functions.

topics.name: Statistics
topics.description: The practice or science of collecting and analyzing numerical data in large quantities.

topics.name: Probability
topics.description: The branch of mathematics concerned with the analysis of random phenomena.

topics.name: Linear Algebra
topics.description: The branch of mathematics concerning linear equations, linear functions, and their representations through matrices and vector spaces.

topics.name: Differential Equations
topics.description: The branch of mathematics focused on functions and the derivatives of functions, and the solutions of those functions.

topics.name: Discrete Mathematics
topics.description: The study of mathematical structures that are fundamentally discrete rather than continuous.

topics.name: Number Theory
topics.description: The branch of pure mathematics concerned primarily with the study of integers and integer-valued functions.

topics.name: Topology
topics.description: The mathematical study of the properties of space that are preserved under continuous deformations.

topics.name: Fractions
topics.description: A numerical quantity that is not a whole number, representing a part of a whole.

topics.name: Decimals
topics.description: A number that includes a decimal point to represent a fraction of a base ten.

topics.name: Percentages
topics.description: A way of expressing a number as a fraction of 100.

topics.name: Ratios and Proportions
topics.description: The comparison of two quantities and their relative sizes.

topics.name: Measurement
topics.description: The process of obtaining the size, length, or amount of something, typically using standard units.

topics.name: Basic Geometry
topics.description: An introduction to the properties and relations of points, lines, surfaces, and shapes.
